Atlanta.Orme Park:
Orme Park is a 6.6-acre (2.7 ha) park in Atlanta, Georgia. It is located along Clear Creek in the Virginia Highland neighborhood.


== 2011 renovation ==
In 2011 a $203,000 renovation was completed, funded by "Friends of Orme Park", the Virginia-Highland Conservation League, the City of Atlanta, and a grant from Park Pride.
